description:
Do you have a small business that primarily sells online?

Prepare your business for growth this holiday season with strategies to grow through Facebook marketing and advertising.

In this training, Amy will share with you a complete blueprint to increase brand visibility and increase SALES this holiday season.

This training includes:

  • A specific strategy plan marketing your business on Facebook.
  • Six video training modules with checklists to maximize your effectiveness.
  • Training for the kinds of Facebook Ads that are working right now for small business owners, especially if you have limited funds/time to implement.
  • Image creation tutorial so that you can Do It Yourself or assign this to someone on your team.

This course was created by Amy Boehnert, of Cardinal Point Media, who has worked for over four years with one of the world's leading experts on Facebook Advertising, which provided a "backstage pass" to the inner workings of online advertising and marketing campaigns for entrepreneurs, celebrities, writers, as well as Fortune 500 companies.

Amy took these high-level strategies and began implementing them for small businesses.
title: Facebook Marketing & Advertising for the Holidays
